Core Utils

This are the Dragon core utils for Python

  • Classes

  • Functions

  • Enums

  • Exceptions

Classes

class B64

Cython wrapper for Dragon’s byte <> string conversion routines.

__init__()

Convert a bytes array into a base64 encoded string.

Parameters

data – The list of bytes to convert.

Returns

A new B64String object containing the base64 encoded string.

__new__(**kwargs)
classmethod bytes_to_str(the_bytes)

Converts bytes into a string by base64 encoding it.

Convenience function to convert bytes objects to base64 encoded strings.

Parameters

the_bytes – bytes to get encoded

Returns

string

classmethod str_to_bytes(the_str)

Converts a base64 encoded string to a bytes object.

Convenience function to unpack strings.

Parameters

the_str – base64 encoded string.

Returns

original bytes representation.
